TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit GridView extends System.Windows.Controls.ViewBase implements class System.Windows.Markup.IAddChild
Public Class GridView Inherits ViewBase Implements IAddChild
public ref class GridView : System::Windows::Controls::ViewBase, System::Windows::Markup::IAddChild

summary.span: 表示在 控制項的資料行中顯示資料項目的檢視模式。

span.span: Represents a view mode that displays data items in columns for a control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 類別和其支援的類別提供基礎結構，以顯示所指定的資料項目一系列的資料行中的控制項。The class and its supporting classes provide the infrastructure to display data items that are specified for a control in a series of columns. 此資料行有資料行標頭，也就是衍生自的按鈕，及您可以使用拖放作業重新排列欄位。The columns have column headers, which are buttons that are derived from , and you can reorder the columns by using drag-and-drop operations. 請注意，資料行的顯示資料，並不提供直接存取資料的來源。Note that the columns of a display data and do not provide direct access to the source of the data. 若要指定作為檢視模式，將屬性物件。To specify a as the view mode for a , set the property to a object. 類別衍生自。The class is derived from . 您可以定義自訂檢視繼承自檢視提供支援的項目類別。You can define custom views by inheriting from the class that provides the supporting elements for a view. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[How to： 建立自訂檢視模式的 ListView](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/how-to-create-a-custom-view-mode-for-a-listview.md)。For more information, see [How to: Create a Custom View Mode for a ListView](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/how-to-create-a-custom-view-mode-for-a-listview.md). 下圖顯示的範例使用。The following illustration shows an example of a that uses a . ![ListView 與 GridView 輸出](~/add/media/listviewgridview.JPG "ListView 與 GridView 輸出")![ListView with GridView output](~/add/media/listviewgridview.JPG "ListView with GridView output") 中的資料行定義為物件。The columns in a are defined as objects. 在[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xaml](~/includes/tlasharptla-xaml-md.md)]，您可以定義物件做為子項目的。In [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xaml](~/includes/tlasharptla-xaml-md.md)], you can define objects as child elements of the . 在程式碼中，您可以加入至使用屬性和方法定義的類別。In code, you can add a to the by using the property and the method that is defined for the class. 同樣地，您可以使用其他這類方法和修改中的資料行。Similarly, you can use other methods such as and to modify the columns in a . 下列範例示範如何定義的資料行。The following example shows how to define the columns of a . [!code-csharp[ListViewCode#GridViewColumn](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/ListViewCode/CSharp/Window1.xaml.cs#gridviewcolumn)] [!code-vb[ListViewCode#GridViewColumn](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/ListViewCode/visualbasic/window1.xaml.vb#gridviewcolumn)] [!code-xaml[ListViewCode#GridViewColumn](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/ListViewCode/CSharp/Window1.xaml#gridviewcolumn)] 若要設定樣式中的資料列，定義的樣式控制項。To style the rows in a , define a style for the controls in the . 若要加入視覺項目，例如或控制，請為，使用範本或樣式。To add visual elements, such as a or control, to a , use templates or styles. 如需範例，請參閱[How to： 建立具有核取方塊的 ListViewItems](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/how-to-create-listviewitems-with-a-checkbox.md)。For an example, see [How to: Create ListViewItems with a CheckBox](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/how-to-create-listviewitems-with-a-checkbox.md). ## Examples 下列範例示範如何定義實作控制項做為其。The following example shows how to define a control that implements a as its . [!code-xaml[ListViewSnips#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/ListViewSnips/CSharp/Window1.xaml#1)]

span.span: Gets or sets the style to apply to column headers.

value.span: ，可用來定義資料行標頭的顯示屬性。

span.span: The that is used to define the display properties for column headers.

value.span: 預設值是 。

span.span: The default value is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性和屬性兩者都用來定義的視覺化樹狀表示資料行標頭中的物件。The property and the property are both used to define the visual tree for the objects that represent the column headers in a . 屬性也可以定義資料行標頭內容時未藉由指定藉由定義如物件。The property can also define column header content when a is not by specified by defining a for the object. 這個屬性表示下列其中一種配置，並設定資料行行首的樣式。This property represents one of several ways to lay out and style column headers. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 [GridView 資料行標頭樣式和範本概觀](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/gridview-column-header-styles-and-templates-overview.md)。For more information, see [GridView Column Header Styles and Templates Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/gridview-column-header-styles-and-templates-overview.md). 當您設定樣式時，但有一些限制。When you set styles, there are some restrictions. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 [設定樣式和範本](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/styling-and-templating.md)。For more information, see [Styling and Templating](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/styling-and-templating.md). ## XAML Attribute UsageXAML Attribute Usage ```

summary.span: 取得或設定複合字串，這個字串會指定如何格式化顯示為字串之 的資料行行首。

value.span: 複合字串，指定如何格式化顯示為字串之 的資料行行首。

span.span: A composite string that specifies how to format the column headers of the if they are displayed as strings.

span.span: The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果， ，或屬性設定，則會忽略這個屬性。If the , , or property is set, this property is ignored. 您可以使用數個屬性來指定資料行標頭的格式。You can use several properties to specify the format of the column headers. 如果設定多個屬性，具有最高優先權的屬性值以格式化資料行標頭。If more than one property is set, the column header is formatted with the value of the property that has the highest priority. 可以數種類型上設定資料行的格式。The format for a column can be set on several types. 下列清單顯示的屬性可以用來格式化資料行標頭，從最低到最高優先順序排序：The following list shows the properties that can be used to format the column headers, ordered from lowest to highest priority: - - - ## 相依性屬性資訊Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |識別項欄位Identifier field|| |中繼資料屬性設定為 **，則為 true**Metadata properties set to **true**|無None|

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果您未設定這個屬性，是使用預設邏輯如果已定義的所有資料行的屬性。If you do not set this property, the default logic is to use the property for all columns if it is defined. 如果屬性和同時設定屬性，屬性會優先。If the property and the property are both set, the property takes precedence. 這個屬性表示下列其中一種配置，並設定資料行行首的樣式。This property represents one of several ways to lay out and style column headers. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 [GridView 資料行標頭樣式和範本概觀](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/gridview-column-header-styles-and-templates-overview.md)。For more information, see [GridView Column Header Styles and Templates Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/gridview-column-header-styles-and-templates-overview.md). ## XAML Attribute UsageXAML Attribute Usage ```

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您可以使用這個唯讀靜態屬性，在[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xaml](~/includes/tlasharptla-xaml-md.md)]由其靜態值指派給另一個屬性值。You can use this read-only static property in [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xaml](~/includes/tlasharptla-xaml-md.md)] by assigning its static value to another property value. 具體而言，這個屬性的靜態值定義用來查閱 預設的資源索引鍵樣式。Specifically, this property's static value defines the resource key that is used to look up the default style of a . 若要重新定義此樣式，參考使用[X:static 標記延伸](~/docs/framework/xaml-services/x-static-markup-extension.md)並指派該值做為[X:key 指示詞](~/docs/framework/xaml-services/x-key-directive.md)新。To redefine this style, reference the by using the [x:Static Markup Extension](~/docs/framework/xaml-services/x-static-markup-extension.md) and assign that value as the [x:Key Directive](~/docs/framework/xaml-services/x-key-directive.md) of the new .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您可以使用這個唯讀靜態屬性，在[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xaml](~/includes/tlasharptla-xaml-md.md)]由其靜態值指派給另一個屬性值。You can use this read-only static property in [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xaml](~/includes/tlasharptla-xaml-md.md)] by assigning its static value to another property value. 具體而言，這個屬性的靜態值定義用來查閱 預設的資源索引鍵樣式。Specifically, this property's static value defines the resource key that is used to look up the default style. 若要重新定義此樣式，參考使用[X:static 標記延伸](~/docs/framework/xaml-services/x-static-markup-extension.md)並指派該值做為[X:key 指示詞](~/docs/framework/xaml-services/x-key-directive.md)新。To redefine this style, reference the by using the [x:Static Markup Extension](~/docs/framework/xaml-services/x-static-markup-extension.md) and assign that value as the [x:Key Directive](~/docs/framework/xaml-services/x-key-directive.md) of the new . 您可以使用這個唯讀屬性[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xaml](~/includes/tlasharptla-xaml-md.md)]為[X:key 指示詞](~/docs/framework/xaml-services/x-key-directive.md)的，會重新定義如。You can use this read-only property in [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xaml](~/includes/tlasharptla-xaml-md.md)] as an [x:Key Directive](~/docs/framework/xaml-services/x-key-directive.md) of a that redefines the for the .
